trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il motivo per cui è stato chiuso un form.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is closed, either through user action or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>gli eventi vengono generati quando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>viene chiuso, a livello di codice o tramite un'azione utente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: Handlers for these events receive parameters of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: I gestori per questi eventi ricevono i parametri di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs>, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Both of these event argument classes use the CloseReason enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le classi di argomento evento utilizzare l'enumerazione CloseReason.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit*> method of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Application"></xref> class was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit*>metodo il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Application"> </xref> classe è stata richiamata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit*>

trans-unit.source: The parent form of this multiple document interface (MDI) form is closing.
trans-unit.target: Chiusura del form padre di questo form MDI (interfaccia) a documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: The cause of the closure was not defined or could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: La causa della chiusura non è stata definita o non può essere determinata.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Windows Task Manager is closing the application.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows Task Manager sta chiudendo l'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The user is closing the form through the user interface (UI), for example by clicking the **Close** button on the form window, selecting **Close** from the window's control menu, or pressing ALT+F4.
trans-unit.target: L'utente sta chiudendo il form tramite l'interfaccia utente (UI), ad esempio facendo clic di **Chiudi** pulsante nella finestra del form, selezionando **Chiudi** dal menu di controllo, la finestra o premendo ALT + F4.

trans-unit.source: The operating system is closing all applications before shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Chiusura in corso di tutte le applicazioni prima di arrestare il sistema operativo.
